sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form
        ref="form">
        <v-dialog v-model="show" max-width="600" persistent>
            <v-card>
                <v-card-title>My Title</v-card-title>
                <v-text-field
                    :value="planname"
                    @input="$emit('input', $event)">
                </v-text-field>
                <v-btn
                    @click="close">
                    Close
                </v-btn>
            </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
    </v-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'TestDialog',
    data: () => ({
    }),
    props: {
        value: Boolean,
        plan: Object,
    },
    watch: {
        planname() {
            console.log(planname)
        }
    },
    computed: {
        show: {
            get() {
                return this.value
            },
            set(value) {
                this.$emit('input', value)
            },
        },
        planname: {
            get() {
                console.log('get plan.name: ', this.plan.name)
                return this.plan.name
            },
            set(val) {
                console.log('set planname: ', val)
                console.log('set plan.name: ', this.plan.name)
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        close() {
            this.planname = this.plan.name
            console.log('close planname: ', this.planname)
            this.show = false
            this.$refs.form.reset()

            console.log('close after reset planname: ', this.planname)
        }
    }
}
</script>
